title: Bolsonaro Agrees to Transition, Two Days After Losing Brazil Election
description: Breaking his silence, President Jair Bolsonaro did not admit defeat or repeat his baseless claims about election fraud, but his administration signaled that the transfer of power would proceed.
dc:creator: Jack Nicas and André Spigariol
media:credit: Dado Galdieri for The New York Times
media:description: President Jair Bolsonaro of Brazil arriving for a news conference at the Alvorada Palace along with his ministers on Tuesday in Brasilia, the capital.
